Tier 1 Skill: Puncture: Deal 10 piercing physical damage to an enemy.
Tier 2 Skill: Blight: Inflict Infection: 1 on an enemy.
Tier 3 Skill: Eye Pierce: Deal 15 piercing physical damage to an enemy. Inflict Blind: 2.
Tier 4 Skill: Diamond Cross: Deal 14 physical damage to an enemy. Inflict Vulnerable: 2.

Tier 1 Skill: Hammerfist: Deal 20 physical damage to an enemy.
Tier 2 Skill: Malform: Push. Deal 10 physical damage to an enemy. Collision: Inflict Rooted: 2.
Tier 3 Skill: Hammerslam: Deal 25 explosive damage to a space. Adjacent spaces take 10 explosive damage.
Tier 4 Skill: Heavyweight Charge: Slow. Move forward as much as possible. Deal 30 explosive damage to an enemy.

Tier 1 Skill: Mesmerize: Inflict Confusion: 3 on an enemy.
Tier 2 Skill: Mindspike: Deal 16 magic damage to an enemy.
Tier 3 Skill: Mental Guard: Give a friendly character Shield: 2.
Tier 4 Skill: Skull Cage: Inflict Stun: 2 on an enemy.

Tier 1 Skill: Pus Breath: Inflict Poison: 4 on an enemy.
Tier 2 Skill: Tanglenet: Place Web: 3 on an enemy space.

Tier 1 Skill: Dark Echo: Deal 10 dark damage to an enemy column. Deal 5 dark damage to the column behind it.
Tier 2 Skill: Wildfire: Deal 12 fire damage to an enemy. Inflict Burning: 3 on adjacent enemies.
Tier 3 Skill: Armor Shriek: Inflict Timid: 2 on all enemies. Gain Decoy: 2.
Tier 4 Skill: Skymaster: Deal 18 physical damage to a row of enemies.

Tier 2 Skill: Crystal Nutrients: Restore 10 Health to all friendly characters.
Tier 3 Skill: Maggot March: Slow. Summon two Crystal Grubs.
Tier 4 Skill: Void Gift: Place Corruption: 4 on three random empty enemy spaces.

Tier 1 Skill: Shred: Inflict Bleeding: 5 on an enemy.
Tier 2 Skill: Butcher: Double Strike. Deal 8 physical damage to an enemy.
Tier 3 Skill: Incision: Deal 10 physical damage to an enemy. Inflict Timid: 3.
Tier 4 Skill: Sapphire Claw: Deal 9 physical damage to an enemy and inflict Infection: 2.

Tier 1 Skill: Mortality: Set an enemy's Health to 1.
Tier 3 Skill: Mind Shatter: Inflict Confusion: 3 and _____on an enemy.
Tier 5 Skill: Blight Fog: Inflict Infection: 5 on all enemies.

Enemy, Boss, or Miniboss: Deal 13 light damage to an enemy. Inflict Blind: 2.
Deal 10 magic damage to an enemy. Inflict Jammed: 2.
Deal 12 piercing physical damage to an enemy.
Place Swarm: 5 on an enemy space.
